Welcome to the **aMeta: an accurate and memory-efficient ancient Metagenomic profiling workflow** [@Pochon-Bergfeldt-2022] course that will be held in Mersin University, Department of Biotechnology in the scope of the European Union funded [NEOMATRIX]() collaboration project.

In this web page, we aim to publish the tutorial material of aMeta ancient metagenomic profiling workflow.

**aMeta** is designed to analyse the microbial content in ancient specimens from wide variety of source organisms (including humans).

Please find our preprint through this [link](https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2022.10.03.510579v1).

Please find the whole pipline through this [github repo](https://github.com/NBISweden/aMeta)
